arabic.title: بطلت الغرام
text: واللى كان ولا ولا على بالى
واللى كان ولا ولا على باله

english.title: Battalt il-gharam
text: i totally quited the love , i quited the love
they bring the problems,and many gossips
i wish you know what happened to me
i was living with my mind clear
i met a girl ,i followed her
she took a slow and i took it slow with her
she goes right and she goes left
let's get close to her too
this is what she's done it life
i met agirl with green eyes
i met another girl with brown eyes
i thought i would take a rest

arabic.title: روميو
text: لو لو لو لو لالي يا روميو
أنا والبنات  يا روميو بينا حكايات
إزاي أنا كل يومين مع بنت تحبني
بنوتة قالتلي يا روميو إنت سحرتني

english.title: Romeo
text: me and the girls, share many tales
and nights and love and words that melt their hearts
no matter how much I fall in love, i couldn't stop
how could the world be good for me if I stay away from them
all the guys are going insane
wondering how each 2 days I'm with a new girl that loves me
I'm Romeo the lover, I can't leave...
...a girl that told me "Romeo you charmed me"
there are girls who are friends, living in torture
ever since their eyes decided to fall in love
always on dates, and say and repeat
words that have been said a hundred times and still they believe them
if a girl called me, because she loved me
and she wasn't cute tell her Romeo isn't here
I can't sleep, how many did I love
whites, brutnettes and those with colored eyes
me and the girls, share many tales
and nights and love and words that melt their hearts
no matter how much I fall in love, i couldn't stop
how could the world be good for me if I stay away from them
